testsuite.name: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.name: Given I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.name: When I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the assignment "Software"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.name: And I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.name: And I click the new question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.name: And I create question "Light Speed" with label "Light Speed Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.name: Then I edit the question to have name "Java Object 2" with label "Java Object Label 2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.name: And I save & close the edited question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.name: Then verify the question caption text is "Java Object Label 2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the questions page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment

testcase.name: And I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit Question when creating new assignment
